item.title: Demo Video - Upwork
item.description:
I need demo videos for my 2 apps.

1. Web App:
   - Create demo video for around 20-40s only.
   - No voice over.
   - Sample https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nJTsbZojero
2. Mobile App:
   - Create demo video for around 15-25s only.
   - No voice over.
   - Need apply device to open the app
  - Sample https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_fjRw8_fY1s

The demo video will be used in website and also embed portions of that video inside a reel video for promotions.

I have a fixed budget so if you're not happy with my budget, please ignore my post.

Please also sahre your previous projects for my review. I need someone who already have experienced doing similar type of video.

Budget: $20

item.title: Videographer in London wanted - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for someone with a good camera, or iPhone 14Pro 15 Pro, to shoot the London Eye for us.

We want two angles (from across the river + from the bridge).

We want you to fully check the weather on your own and propose the best option to shoot with examples, mockups from Google Street View and confirm with us, how you will shoot the video/perspective/composition.

4K, 60fps.

Thank you :)

item.title: Video Editor for Weekly Faceless Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are in need of a skilled Video Editor who can deliver 10+ faceless videos each week. The videos should be around fifty seconds long and should not feature any faces. You will also be required to attend weekly meetings to discuss the progress and make any necessary adjustments. The ideal candidate must have experience in video editing, be creative, and have a good eye for detail. Strong organizational and time management skills are essential to ensure that all videos are delivered on time. If you are passionate about creating engaging videos and can meet these requirements, we would love to work with you.  Please start your application with the sentence: "I love adjectives"

example of the niche: https://www.youtube.com/@asimplesponge

item.title: Virtual Assistant with Content Creation, Video Editing, Copywriting Experience - Upwork
item.description:
I am seeking a highly skilled and motivated Virtual Assistant with a strong background in content creation and video editing. The ideal candidate will be adept at using various digital tools and platforms to produce engaging content and streamline project management. If you are creative, detail-oriented, can proof-read english very well and possess excellent communication skills I want to hear from you!

A bit about me: I assist coaches and course creators with their digital marketing and am looking for someone to assist me with tasks like content calendars, email marketing campaigns, resource creation, analytics reports, and scheduling content.

Responsibilities.

Develop engaging and visually appealing content for social media, websites, and other digital platforms.
Utilize Canva to design graphics, presentations, and marketing materials.
Write and edit blog posts, newsletters, and other written content.

Edit videos for social media, webinars, and promotional materials using CapCut and other editing tools.
Create compelling video content that aligns with our brand and marketing goals.

Coordinate and manage content production schedules using Asana.
Ensure timely delivery of all projects and adhere to deadlines.

Use Kajabi to manage online courses, memberships, and digital products.
Implement marketing campaigns and track performance analytics.

Leverage ChatGPT for content ideation, writing assistance, and enhancing productivity.
Integrate AI tools to streamline workflows and improve efficiency.

Proficiency in Canva for designing and creating marketing materials.
Strong writing and editing skills for developing high-quality written content.

Experience with CapCut or similar video editing software.
Ability to produce and edit videos that engage and inform audiences.

Familiarity with Asana for project coordination and task management.
Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines.

Knowledge of Kajabi for managing online courses and digital products.
Experience in setting up and managing marketing campaigns on Kajabi.

Experience using ChatGPT for content creation and productivity enhancement.
Ability to integrate AI tools into daily workflows to improve efficiency.

Proven experience as a Virtual Assistant or in a similar role.
Strong understanding of digital marketing, content creation, and video editing.
Excellent communication and organizational skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Creative mindset with a keen eye for detail.

How to Apply:
If you are passionate about content creation and video editing and have the skills and experience required, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume, a cover letter, and samples of your work that demonstrate your expertise in the tools and skills mentioned above. Write the word "Coaching" in your application so I know you read the full thing.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 15:55 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:Asana, Canva, ChatGPT, CapCut, Virtual Assistance, Copywriting, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing
Skills: Asana, Canva, ChatGPT, CapCut, Virtual Assistance, Copywriting, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: YouTube Voice Over Artist (NBA/Basketball Channel) - Upwork
item.description:
This is a LONG-TERM position with GREAT benefits such as bonuses and raises based on quality work and performance!
You will be responsible for narrating 8–12-minute videos 1-2 times weekly

Below are links to reference channels for you to refer to that will give you a better understanding of the tone, word emphasis, speed, and level of quality we need from you.

1. REBOUND (https://www.youtube.com/@rebound)
2. Dime (https://www.youtube.com/@dime-)
3. HoopFlix (https://www.youtube.com/@HoopFlix)

Requirements:
1. English expert
2. Professional equipment
3. 36h or less turnaround time
4. Understanding of the channel’s personality (which is more comedic than serious)
5. Willing to work long term and grow with the team

(10 Voice Overs For $300)

Please provide samples of previous work to be considered for the position!
Look forward to receiving your work.


Budget: $300

Category: Voice Talent

Skills: Voice-Over, Audio Editing, Male

item.title: Simple video edit / creation in 24 hours - Upwork
item.description:
I need a short video (total run time will end up being less than one minute) created that familiarizes customers with a product.  I have all of the raw footage, I just need a few shorts strung together and perhaps a few stills inserted.  I need some visual graphics as well.  I have made videos like this myself using Vimeo but I need it done in 24 hrs and I don't have the time do it myself.  I can provide all of the raw footage and a clear explanation of everything that I need including graphics etc.  When I do thie myself in Vimeo, it takes me about 1-2 hours.  For somebody that has experience in this sort of thing, I'm guessing the whole effort will take an hour or less.  The most important thing is that I need this by mid-morning tomorrow (7/2/2024).  I'm available to correspond all day today - so please only submit your interested if you have availability today.  Thanks.

Budget: $75

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Demo Video, Audio Editing, Video Annotation, Video Cleanup, Visual Effects, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Graphic Design

item.title: Video Editor for AI Education Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Who are we?
We are Annora. We create AI solutions for businesses that increase employee productivity. Many AI companies are about displacing workers, we are about empowering workers.

We are currently working on a video series which will be posted on YouTube and cut into clips to be posted on Shorts, Instagram and TikTok.
The video series will be basic AI education videos targeted at businesses and business owners.
We will be starting with really basic videos and working up to more complicated concepts over time. The main idea of the series is to educate business owners about AI so it becomes less scary for them. We also want to help them educate their staff so they can become more productive and be the driving force for growth in the company.

The video length will be 3-4 minutes and we will be sticking to one or two concepts per video.
The aim for this series will be to attract inbound leads for our business and also for people to see when they do research on our business.
Therefore we are not looking for flashy editing, we are looking for clean editing that looks professionally done but also keeps our viewers engaged.

Skills Required:
Experience editing educational content
Content marketing experience
Video conversion from YouTube to Short-form

Who are we looking for?
We are looking for someone who wants to form a long term partnership with our business. We plan to be the number 1 provider of AI solutions to enterprises and we will require a good content and marketing strategy to achieve this.
Out ideal candidate is someone to can add ideas and improve the content.

There are many available opportunities for someone who can display the level of professionalism and quality that we are looking for.
We have connections to other businesses who may also need help with content marketing so there may be opportunity to work with our clients over time too.

Nice to have:
Understanding of AI
Business knowledge

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 15:43 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Explainer Video
Country: Ireland
click to apply

item.title: Freelance Video Editor for Training and Content Videos - Upwork
item.description:
Our company is seeking a talented freelance video editor to join our team on a periodic basis. The ideal candidate will have experience editing training and content videos, ensuring they are engaging, professional, and aligned with our brand’s standards.

Responsibilities:
- Edit training and content videos according to provided specifications.
- Enhance video quality, including color correction, sound editing, and adding graphics or animations as needed.
- Collaborate with our team on scripting and story planning to ensure videos meet our educational and engagement goals.
- Incorporate feedback from our team to make necessary revisions.
- Ensure consistency in style and branding across all video content.

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a video editor, with a portfolio of previous work in training and content videos.
- Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
- Strong understanding of video formats, codecs, and best practices for video production.
- Ability to work independently and manage time effectively to meet deadlines.
- Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.

Deliverables:
- Edited training and content videos that meet our specifications and quality standards.
- Final video files delivered in the required formats.
- Project files and assets for future use and reference.

About Us:
We specialize in providing solutions for telecom site automation and are expanding our reach to the power and utility industries. Our training and content videos are essential tools for educating our clients and partners about our products and services.

How to Apply:
Please submit your proposal along with your portfolio, highlighting your experience with similar projects. Include a brief description of your editing process and your typical turnaround time for a project.


Posted On: July 01, 2024 15:35 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

Our company is seeking a talented freelance video editor to join our team on a periodic basis. The ideal candidate will have experience editing training and content videos, ensuring they are engaging, professional, and aligned with our brand’s standards.

Responsibilities:
- Edit training and content videos according to provided specifications.
- Enhance video quality, including color correction, sound editing, and adding graphics or animations as needed.
- Collaborate with our team on scripting and story planning to ensure videos meet our educational and engagement goals.
- Incorporate feedback from our team to make necessary revisions.
- Ensure consistency in style and branding across all video content.

Requirements:
- Proven experience as a video editor, with a portfolio of previous work in training and content videos.
- Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
- Strong understanding of video formats, codecs, and best practices for video production.
- Ability to work independently and manage time effectively to meet deadlines.
- Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.

Deliverables:
- Edited training and content videos that meet our specifications and quality standards.
- Final video files delivered in the required formats.
- Project files and assets for future use and reference.

About Us:
We specialize in providing solutions for telecom site automation and are expanding our reach to the power and utility industries. Our training and content videos are essential tools for educating our clients and partners about our products and services.

How to Apply:
Please submit your proposal along with your portfolio, highlighting your experience with similar projects. Include a brief description of your editing process and your typical turnaround time for a project.

item.title: Experienced Video Editor for Firearms Review - YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
Looking for 8 minute long videos focusing on certain topics in the gun world. For instance, here are a few topics we would like to cover. Yes, this can become long-term work if the first few are successful and creative. Take a look below. I'm hoping to find someone experienced enough in firearms so models, politics and ammunition titles and numbers aren't foreign language please.

Examples:
- Top 5 popular Glocks
- Top 5 CCW
- Top 5 movie guns of all times (this can go into movies from the cowboy days to HEAT, etc.)
- Best S&W revolvers in 357 and why?
- Best SIG SAUER's for 2024
- If sometimes we want to go into the political to spark some comments we can talk about - What does the Sin Tax in California look like at the register? After July 1st, what can consumers do to adjust to the increase in taxes? Stop buying? No!
- Top 5 AR's for Home and why?
- Top 5 Lever Action - Henry, Marlin etc. and why?

Main goal is to launch 2-3 videos a week. Highly motivated to get this going.

Some References in style and quality.
Youtube.com/line45
Youtube.com/Allaboutsurvival

item.title: Video Reviewer - Test and Evaluate Online Websites in Make Money Category - Upwork
item.description:
Do you have a keen eye for detail and love uncovering the truth? Are you comfortable on camera? We're looking for a video reviewer in the US to join our team and create informative reviews of online and offline earning platforms.

In this role, you'll:

- Sign up for popular platforms like Swagbucks, User Interviews, Instacart and more to test your detective skills.
- Earn real money by completing surveys, following instructions on microtask platforms, and trying out gig economy jobs (keep these earnings – they're yours!)
- Test the app for around 5 hours
- Document your experience: record yourself cashing out and completing tasks.
- Become a star! Create engaging video reviews which will be edited by professional video editor (no prior video experience needed, we'll provide training!)

Why You'll Love Working Here:

- Flexible hours: work whenever you want, wherever you want as long as it's in USA.
- Competitive pay: earn $75 per video review (expenses covered if any), plus keep your earnings from the app that you have tested (up to $15 extra per hour!)
- Be a part of something bigger: your reviews help others make informed decisions online.
- Focus on your performance, not editing: Don't worry about perfecting your video editing skills - our team will handle the post-production magic!

Ready to join the team?

If you're a detail-oriented individual with a passion for sharing your discoveries, we want to hear from you! Apply today!

Budget: $75
Posted On: July 01, 2024 15:35 UTC
Category: Product Reviews
Skills:Market Analysis, Review Website, YouTube, Testing, Survey
Skills: Market Analysis, Review Website, YouTube, Testing, Survey

item.title: Create Tribute Page and Slideshow for Funeral - Upwork
item.description:
I am seeking a skilled designer/video editor to help create a tribute page and a slideshow for my father’s funeral. The tribute page will be an A4-sized document with up to 16 photos, and the slideshow will be approximately 1 hour long, featuring 100 photos and 4-5 short videos.

Project Requirements:
1. Tribute Page (A4 Size):

Create a visually appealing A4 tribute page with up to 16 photos.
Arrange photos in a grid format (4x4) with captions under each photo.
Add design elements like borders, frames, and background colors to enhance the page.
2. Slideshow:

Create a slideshow of about 1 hour in length.
Include 100 photos and 4-5 videos (each around 1 minute long).
Set each photo to display for 5-7 seconds with modern transitions.
Add an opening title slide with my father’s name and dates.
Insert text slides with quotes, memories, or messages between photo sections.
Ensure the slideshow has a respectful and gentle tone.
Deliverables:

A high-quality PDF of the A4 tribute page.
A video file (MP4) of the slideshow, ready to be played from a USB drive.
Additional Information:

All photos and video footage will be provided.
Skills Required:
Proficiency in graphic design software (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator).
Experience with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, iMovie, Windows Movie Maker).
Ability to create modern and respectful designs and transitions.
Good communication skills to understand and implement specific requirements.
Timeline:
The project needs to be completed within 5 days.
How to Apply:
Please provide examples of similar work you have done.
Include a brief description of how you plan to approach this project.
State your availability and confirm you can meet the deadline.

Hourly Range: $11.00-$22.00
Posted On: July 01, 2024 15:28 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Graphic Design, Photo Slideshow, Adobe Photoshop
Skills: Graphic Design, Photo Slideshow, Adobe Photoshop
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for 3-Minute High-Quality Videos (50 videos) - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced video editor to join our team and assist with editing a series of 50 videos, each ranging from 2 to 3 minutes in length. The videos need to be edited to high standards, following the format of a provided sample.

**Project Details:**

- **Number of Videos:** 50
- **Length of Each Video:** 2-3 minutes
- **Format:** Horizontal
- **Quality:** High-quality editing required
- **Raw and Sample Videos:** The raw video files and a sample video showing the required editing style can be found.

**Requirements:**

1. **Experience:** Proven experience in video editing with a portfolio showcasing similar projects.
2. **Software:** Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or equivalent.
3. **Attention to Detail:** Ability to follow the sample video closely and ensure consistency across all videos.
4. **Quality:** Videos must be edited in high quality, with smooth transitions, clear audio, and vibrant visuals.
5. **Timeliness:** Ability to deliver edited videos within agreed timelines.

**Responsibilities:**

- Review and understand the provided raw video and sample video.
- Edit the raw footage to match the style and quality of the sample video.
- Ensure all videos are in horizontal format.
- Apply necessary edits including cutting, trimming, adding transitions, and enhancing audio and visual quality.
- Collaborate with our team for any revisions and feedback.

**Application Process:**

If you are interested in this project, please submit your proposal along with:
- Your portfolio showcasing similar video editing projects.
- Your estimated timeline for editing all 50 videos.
- Your rate for editing each video or the entire project.
- A sample edited video using the provided raw video to demonstrate your editing skills. The raw video files can be found attached. Raw video has a green background .

We look forward to working with a skilled video editor who can bring our vision to life.

**Budget:** Please provide your rates.

**Location:** Remote

Thank you!

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Concept Video, Testimonial Video, Demo Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Concept Video, Testimonial Video, Demo Video, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing

item.title: White Female UGC Actor for Social Media Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for White Female UGC Actors to film two short videos for us, for an ABA Clinic in Georgia. More details are provided in this document: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1MMdlnK1mkYXCJVs5ojuUUhTzp5qST_t-XEYa-B3yWc8/edit

Video Scripts:
Right now, we are looking for 2 videos, these are the questions:

Video 1: Who provides ABA therapy?

A BCBA (Board Certified Behavior Therapist) will conduct an assessment.  She will use the data from this assessment as well as the parents' concerns to create an individualized plan for the child. This will cover areas of behavior, learning, communications, social, life and independent skills.

The RBT (Registered Behavior Technician) is the child’s one-on-one therapist who will work on the goals designed by the BCBA daily. She will take data to ensure progress and effectiveness.

The BCBA will supervise the RBT and monitor and update the goals. She also has monthly or bi-monthly meetings with the parents and caregivers to go over goals, discuss progress, and answer any questions.

Video 2: When should a child start ABA therapy?

The research is always clear on the importance of starting young with early intervention. If a child begins working on communication skills during the years that he or she is supposed to be learning to communicate, the process will be much simpler, and the gap will be much smaller.

Children who begin ABA during the early intervention window (ages 0-6) will have stronger communication skills which often leads to less frustration and decreased behaviors.

If you give a child the support he or she needs as they develop, they will learn to function, communicate, and thrive. Delaying ABA therapy can cause increased delays, lack of communication, frustration, confusion, and increased and severe behaviors.




Budget: $200
Posted On: July 01, 2024 15:17 UTC
Category: Acting
Skills:Acting, Middle-Aged Adult, Female, English
Skills: Acting, Middle-Aged Adult, Female, English
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

Video Scripts:
Right now, we are looking for 2 videos, these are the questions:

Video 1: Who provides ABA therapy?

A BCBA (Board Certified Behavior Therapist) will conduct an assessment.  She will use the data from this assessment as well as the parents' concerns to create an individualized plan for the child. This will cover areas of behavior, learning, communications, social, life and independent skills.

The RBT (Registered Behavior Technician) is the child’s one-on-one therapist who will work on the goals designed by the BCBA daily. She will take data to ensure progress and effectiveness.

The BCBA will supervise the RBT and monitor and update the goals. She also has monthly or bi-monthly meetings with the parents and caregivers to go over goals, discuss progress, and answer any questions.

Video 2: When should a child start ABA therapy?

The research is always clear on the importance of starting young with early intervention. If a child begins working on communication skills during the years that he or she is supposed to be learning to communicate, the process will be much simpler, and the gap will be much smaller.

Children who begin ABA during the early intervention window (ages 0-6) will have stronger communication skills which often leads to less frustration and decreased behaviors.

If you give a child the support he or she needs as they develop, they will learn to function, communicate, and thrive. Delaying ABA therapy can cause increased delays, lack of communication, frustration, confusion, and increased and severe behaviors.

item.title: Hiring an enthusiastic, reliable and experienced video editor (REMOTE) - Upwork
item.description:
Position: Remote Video Editor
Location: Pakistan (Remote)
Salary: 200,000 PKR per month (Pakistan) or 58,000 INR per month (India)
Working Hours: Monday to Friday, 10am to 6pm

Are you a talented video editor based in Pakistan or India with a keen eye for detail and a passion for creating professional video content? We are looking for a dedicated individual to join our team as a remote Video Editor for 40 hours per week.

Key Responsibilities:
Produce high-quality video edits for various projects.
Collaborate with the creative team to meet project deadlines.
Ensure all video content aligns with our brand's standards.
Organise and manage multiple video projects concurrently.

Requirements:
Attention to Detail: Ability to spot and correct errors, ensuring seamless, polished video content.
Organised: Efficient in managing multiple tasks and deadlines.
Professional Skills: Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve).
Internet Speed: FAST connection is essential. Please include your internet speed stats in your application.

What We Offer:
Competitive salary
Flexible, remote working from the comfort of your home.
Opportunity to work with a dynamic and creative team.

IMPORTANT:

1. Please include “ProVideoEditor2024” in the title or first line of your response. Applications without this will be automatically rejected.
2. Please include your portfolio or examples of your work. Applications without this will be automatically rejected.
3. Please tell me how what your upload/download speed is.

Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, English, Video Production, Video Editing Software
Skills: CapCut, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, English, Video Production, Video Editing Software
